data.title: Eating right and staying fit with Mishti Khatri. Essentially by Keshav Rai
data.meta_description: This conversation by Keshav Rai is on eating right and staying fit essentially with Mishti Khatri.
data.text:
This conversation by Keshav Rai is on eating right and staying fit essentially with Mishti Khatri.

Mishti is touted as India's fitness queen, an idol to a generation of Indians trying to start their journey in fitness. A pacer at Nike Run Club. Mishti is a professional sports nutritionist and an elite coach.

The episode covers:

Journey and Source of Inspiration for a career-oriented to making the lives of people better. Diet in different cultures, Desi vs West, Balanced Diet. FAQ/ Pain point for a nutritionist. Tips and Hacks for the various lifestyles like Young College Students, Working Professionals and Women. Cost of a healthy lifestyle. Navigation to staying fit in the time of social media influencers, paid native ads and promotions, misinformation on diet. Importance of a good relationship with Food.

I also ask Mishti what's it like being a daughter to super chill parents like Mr Atul Khatri (notable Indian comedian) and Mrs Shagun Khatri (MUA/Hairstylist)

---

This episode is streaming on Spotify and Apple podcasts:
